devdoc.details: Total supply is minted to this contract and is controlled by an owner address that should be a multisig account.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

batchTransfer(address[],uint256[]).details: Batch tranfer: Sends token to many addresses

lockToken(address,uint256).details: Locks certain amount i.e Move from private ledger to the regular balance

transferToken(address,uint256).details: Transfer Token to @param account : Token recipient

unlockToken(uint256).details: Unlocks certain amount i.e Move from private ledger to the regular balance

devdoc.title: Reserve
